change.changenote: Regulation title BEFORE amended by BC Reg 24/2014, effective March 1, 2014.
change.title: National Instrument 23-103 Electronic Trading

change.changenote: Section 1 definitions of "DEA client", "DEA client identifier", "direct electronic access" and "marketplace participant identifier" were added by BC Reg 24/2014, effective March 1, 2014.
Section 1 definition of "marketplace and regulatory requirements", paragraph (c) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 24/2014, effective March 1, 2014.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the applicable requirements set by a recognized exchange, a recognized quotation and trade reporting system or a regulation services provider under section 7.1, 7.3 or 8.2 of NI 23-101;

change.changenote: Section 1 definition of "participant dealer" BEFORE amended by BC Reg 24/2014, effective March 1, 2014.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: participant dealer means a marketplace participant that is an investment dealer.

change.changenote: Part 2.1, sections 4.1 to 4.7 was enacted by BC Reg 24/2014, effective March 1, 2014.
Part 4, section 9.1, enacted by BC Reg 24/2014, effective March 1, 2014.
